title: Timothy Mean and the Time Machine 2
description: With Timothy Meanâ€™s amazing imagination and time machine, anything and anywhere is possible!Join Timothy and sister Lucy on a new magical rhyming adventure in this sequel to the award winning 'Timothy Mean and the Time Machine' children's picture book.Mummies, Gladiators, Cavemen, Albert Einstein, Giant Squids, Leonardo Da Vinci and Aliens make an appearance in this exciting, laugh out loud, time travel escapade.
author: William A.E. Ford
